translations: n.[电子] 振荡器；摆动物；动摇的人

phrs.translation: [物]谐振子；谐波振荡器；谐波发生器
振荡器电路，振荡线路；振荡回路；振荡歧路

sentences.sentence: This oscillator will pick up energy.
Problems arose between oscillator coils and the transistors themselves.
sentences.translation: 问题出在振荡线圈和晶体管之间。

sentences.sentence: Applying the formula into mesoscopic system we get the energy level of linear oscillator.
sentences.translation: 应用能量测不准量公式到介观系统，可得线性谐振子的能级宽度。
